title: (x) OrbaSquara Font - hand-drawn, alternative {Mike Y}
content:
Hey guys,

My design class and I are trying to figure out this font.

Any idea?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ObraSquara America.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209040716/http:/typophile.com/files/ObraSquara%20America_4.jpg) | 96.53 KB |
author: nicolemarie

comments.content:
They will be at it a long time, because I think it's hand-drawn. It resembles [Cabarga Cursiva](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209040716/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/cabarga-cursiva/) a little.

- Mike Yanega

Hi Nicole Marie,  
welcome to Typophile!  
I will delete your other 2 threads with the same request, okay?
